Summary Note:
Francisca Tess Van der Meer and the RM met at a networking event in Amsterdam. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Francisca Tess Van der Meer is a 42 year old and comes from Netherlands.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Francisca Tess Van der Meer and Dekkers have been married since 2008. They are proud parents of 1 child: Vogel.
Education Background:
Francisca earned her secondary school diploma from VWO Dalton Den Haag in 2001.
After that, she went on to study at Erasmus University Rotterdam until 2007.
Occupation History:
Francisca Tess Van der Meer is a 42 year old Director of Operations from Netherlands. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At NLR - Netherlands Aerospace Centre, Francisca Tess Van der Meer held the position of Aerospace Engineer from 2006 to 2010, developing essential skills in the field.
In 2012, she moved to NLR - Netherlands Aerospace Centre to work as a Program Manager, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
In 2016, she joined Airbus Netherlands B.V. as a Director of Operations, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 210000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has condo located in Groningen, worth 1030000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 140000 EUR from her father, a respected Private Equity Manager, in 2007, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
